name: Banckle
description: Banckle provides Collaborative and Social apps to enable global and local team to collaborate in any business settings: Banckle Meeting, Banckle Chat and Banckle Email. Now you can save your time and money while efficiently collaborating with your customers, colleagues and partners, anyplace, anywhere, anytime.

apis.name: Banckle
apis.description: Banckle Apps Suite is accompanied with a set of APIs that lets all our partners and third-party developers to create new and exciting applications by interacting with single or multiple Banckle Apps and borrow some of its features. Also if you feel something is not precisely how you want it to be, you may override it. Extend and tweak the capabilities of Banckle Apps by introducing your own code. This extensibility and customization makes Banckle Apps the best option for any rich internet application (RIA). This robust and powerful set of APIs is very simple and easy to use.
